info.name: WeNet - Service REST APIs
info.description:
This document describes the API exposed by the Service component of the WeNet platform.
In particular, the models entities handled by the Service REST API are
- WeNet application
- WeNet user
- Incoming message - these messages that are written by users and should be handled by the platform in order to create a meaningful response
- Outgoing message - these messages that are created as responses to the incoming messages written by the users
- Task

Contact Support:
 Email: carlo.caprini@u-hopper.com

item.name: Get the list of all users associated to an app

request.description: This endpoint allows to get the details of an existing wenet app.

response.name: The details of the requested app

item.name: Get the details of an app

request.description: This endpoint allows to get the details of an existing wenet app.

response.name: The details of the requested app

item.name: Return the competences of a profile

request.description: This entpoint allows to create a new WeNet user associated to the specified authentication strategy.

response.name: The competences defined into the profile

request.description: This entpoint allows to update the _core_ profile of a wenet user. This is possible by providing the complete user profile that will override the exising one.

response.name: The updated competences of the profile

request.description: This entpoint allows to initialize an empty WeNet user profile. It is expected to be used upon the creation of a new user.

response.name: The profile for the user already exists
